scripts.build: echo 'Building...'; tsc -d -t ES6 -m CommonJS --outDir dist/ index.ts
scripts.test: npm run -s build && echo 6 7 8 | xargs -d' ' -L1 npm run -s cypress:version:run
scripts.cypress:open: npm run -s build && npm run -s cypress -- open
scripts.cypress:run: npm run -s build && npm run -s cypress -- run
scripts.cypress:version:run: fn() { npm run -s cypress:version -- $1; cypress run; }; fn
scripts.cypress:version: fn() { V=${1:-8}; echo "Cypress Version $V"; (npm view cypress version | grep -q "^$V\.") || npm install --no-save cypress@$V && echo Installed.; }; fn
